name: prompttrail-ts
description: PromptTrail: A lightweight library for Prompt Programming, Agent as Code

scripts.dump:ts:
find examples packages -type f -name "*.ts" ! -path "*/node_modules/*" -print0 | while IFS= read -r -d '' file; do echo -e "\`\`\`ts
// $file
"; cat "$file"; echo -e "
\`\`\`
"; done > /tmp/ts_files.txt
scripts.test:cline: tmpfile="/tmp/vitest_output_$(date +%s%N).log" && pnpm exec vitest --run --watch=false > "$tmpfile" 2>&1; cat "$tmpfile" && rm "$tmpfile"
scripts.readme:test: node scripts/generate-readme-tests.js && vitest run --config vitest.readme.config.ts readme.test.ts
scripts.check: pnpm run lint:check && pnpm run format:check
scripts.context: bun run dump_context.ts packages/core/ md ts | tee context.txt
